name: High Eight Video Rentals #2
description:
On dark night, on a lonely highway, a green neon sign flashes, inviting you to enter HIGH-8 VIDEO RENTALS.

The second in a semi-regular interactive fiction series that recommends a selection of films currently available on UK streaming platforms.

For a full list of High 8's latest Recommendations, click here.

Support your local videodrome! Check out legendary video rental shop Twentieth Century Flicks and their DVD postal service.

Big thanks to Nick Dymond at monomoon for the original idea and proofing, and to Jonathan L. Howard for being this month's Writer in Residence.

For exclusive access to new content and free subscriber-only short stories, you can sign up to my newsletter.
